content:
I will give you some context, just answer "read" if you read the following text, don't say anything else.

How far is Hotel Moderne Saint Germain from the centre of Paris?
Hotel Moderne Saint Germain is 950 m from the centre of Paris.
How much does it cost to stay at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain?
The prices at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain may vary depending on your stay (e.g. dates you select, hotel's policy etc.). See the prices by entering your dates.
What kind of breakfast is served at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain?
Guests staying at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain can enjoy a highly-rated breakfast during their stay (guest review score: 7.8).

Continental
Buffet
